column6:
While Psylocke and Kitty Pride are fighting off an army of intruders, the team is faced with the shocking truth of the rivalry between this Earth's Victor Von Doom and Reed Richards. Plus, Miguel O'Hare (Spider-Man 2099) and Gwen Stacy's relationship is taken to the edge.,2007,9
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Simon Bowland | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Ronan Cliquet | penciller (cover):Tomm Coker | colorist:Wil Quintana
